CustomField.description: Determines the invoice region. The produced value will be copied to the field Region on the invoice
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(BillingCountryCode,"DE"), "DE", CASE(TEXT(BillingCountryCode), "AT","AT", "BE","EU", "BG","EU", "CY","EU", "CZ","EU", "DK","EU", "EE","EU", "ES","EU", "FI","EU", "FR","EU", "GR","EU", "HU","EU", "IE","EU", "IT","EU", "HR","EU", "LT","EU", "LU","EU", "LV","EU", "MT","EU", "NL","EU", "PL","EU", "PT","EU", "RO","EU", "SE","EU", "SI","EU", "SK","EU", "SM","EU", "CH","EU", "NON-EU") )
/* IF( AND ( TEXT(Service_Country__c) = "DE" , TEXT(BillingCountryCode) = "DE" ), 'DE' ,
IF( AND ( TEXT(Service_Country__c) = "AT" , TEXT(BillingCountryCode) = "AT" ), 'AT',
'EU' ) )
*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the invoice region. The produced value will be copied to the field Region on the invoice
CustomField.label: JustOn: Region
